protocol_name: Coating of plates with Geltrex, for human iPSC  culture
protocol_name_html: Coating of plates with Geltrex, for human iPSC  culture
before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"5udov","text":"Thaw GeltrexTM Basement Membrane Matrix at 2-8°C overnight. Refrigerator temperatures may vary; therefore, thaw extract on ice in a refrigerator. Basement Membrane Matrix gels in 5-10 minutes above 15°C; therefore when working from a full 5 ml vial, it is unnecessary to keep it on ice if used within 5 minutes and the environmental temperature does not exceed 25°C. It is also unnecessary to prechill pipette tips, tubes, plates, or other objects that may come in contact with the extract. Since smaller volumes warm more quickly, partial tubes and aliquots should be kept on ice to prevent premature gelling. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
warning:
{"blocks":[{"key":"15c2o","text":" When working with volumes of Geltrex <5ml, aliquot to appropriate required working volumes and store at -20 to -80°C. Avoid multiple freeze/thaw cycles. 
 
 
 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines:
{"blocks":[{"key":"9q89g","text":"Geltrex Catalog NO: A1413302 (5 ml from ThermoFischerScientific). Thin Gel Method (non-gelling) for hESC Applications. From: http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC3157883/ 
 
 
 
 
 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
status_info: We use this protocol in our group and it is working

steps.data:
{"blocks":[{"key":"cvdtr","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"9u3ma","text":"Thaw one tube of Geltrex (1-5 mL) slowly at 2-8°C. 
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"8vbh1","text":"Prepare 20X 1.5 ml Eppendorfs for aliquotting of Geltrex, label: 50X 
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6sm2f","text":"Mix Geltrex by slowly pipetting solution up and down; be careful not to introduce air bubbles. 
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2aq3i","text":"On ice: in a 15 ml Falcon tube, mix Geltrex 1:1 with cold DMEM/F12 (Sigma #D6421) and aliquot at 0.5 ml. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":7,"style":"bold"},{"offset":53,"length":4,"style":"bold"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3t4u9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"b2p4","text":"Store the aliquots at -20C.
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"mik1","text":"(REMEMBER TO CHECK EXPIRY DATE ON EVERYTHING) 
 
 
 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"0D5081C0D2DF11E8B9A9C97711C5344D","temperature":"4","unit":10,"label":"","step_guid":"A6FC5ED0D2DE11E8B9A9C97711C5344D"}}],"guid":"A6FC5ED0D2DE11E8B9A9C97711C5344D","id":675111,"previous_id":null,"previous_guid":null,"section":"Thawing of Geltrex, dilution in DMEM/F12 and aliquotting for storage at -20C"}
steps.section: Thawing of Geltrex, dilution in DMEM/F12 and aliquotting for storage at -20C
